channel.title: Multiple Crowns
channel.description:
Hi,
I am trying to make it to my server has, Moderator Crown for Player Rights = 1, Admin Crown for Player Rights = 2, And Owner Crown for Player Rights = 3, but IDK how to do this... Could someone please help me?
I am also trying to figure out on how to make an Advisor Spot, but IDK how to make the spot.
I could care less about the Advisor Spot right now though, I just want to know how I can add separate crowns for separate playerrights..
I am using a PI based source
